name: Dog From Hell
description:
Controls:

  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Throw ball/Drop Object
  • Left/Right (A/D) - Pan Camera
  • Scroll Wheel - Zoom

Instructions

  • Pick up the food(green)/water(blue) bowl and take it to the corresponding filling location to fill the bowl. Place the bowl on the corresponding mat for the dog.
  • You can pickup and throw the ball(orange) to increase the dog's happiness.
    If the dog is not happy he will chew on objects(red) in the house.
